name: Vaccination Credential
description: A form to be used for verifiable COVID-19 vaccination credentials for basic interoperability

attr_information.linkedVaccineCertificate: Unique identifier of the associated vaccination certificate
attr_information.recipient: The resource identifier for a schema used for event recipient identification.
attr_information.disease: Disease or agent the citizen has recovered from.
attr_information.vaccineType: Generic description of the vaccine/prophylaxis or its component(s) [J07BX03 covid-19 vaccines]
attr_information.doseNumber: Number of dose administered in a cycle
attr_information.dosesPerCycle: Number of expected doses for a complete cycle (specific for a person at the time of administration)
attr_information.dateOfVaccination: The date the vaccination event occurred (or was intended to occur)
attr_information.stateOfVaccination: The province or territory in which the individual has been vaccinated
attr_information.countryOfVaccination: The country in which the individual has been vaccinated
attr_information.certificateIssuer: Entity that has issued the certificate (allowing to check the certificate)
attr_information.certificateNumber: Unique identifier of the certificate (UVCI), to be printed (human readable) into the certificate; the unique identifier can be included in the IIS
